attributes.action: rebuild Frontierland and give back Morecambe it's tourism industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Petition is to help the Leisure and Tourism industry grow again in the once great tourist resort of Morecambe, Lancashire. We want to rebuild the once great western theme park frontierland on what land  is available and help Morecambe rise from the ashes as one of the Northwest's busiest tourist attractions for 2008 onwards.
